name: Sex Simulator - Office Promotion
description:
A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of the boss who sleeps with his female employees.

GAME DESCRIPTION

If you've had a blast playing our Sex Simulator series, you'll definitely enjoy this one.
Sex Simulation - Office Promotion presents you the story of three ladies who come to you to ask for different benefits.
Don’t let your sexy employees play with your mind and make them work for what they want. If you know what I mean…
Put them in different positions and show them who’s the boss!

This video game features an arousing gameplay, high-resolution images and videos, realistic-looking characters, elegant environments, and steamy storylines.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations
